I'm pretty sure not having eight gigs of RAM is heretical, but never fear, you can probably compensate by taking a leaf from the God-Emperor's book and arrange for a host of dying psykers to pour their brain energy into your motherboard.
All of which is to say that Focus Home have released the system requirements for huge-shouldered action game Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2. Find them proudly emblazoned across the header image above, and written out for easier copy-pasting in the blockquote, below.
 Read more
articles.title: Omnissiah be praised, Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2's system requirements are here

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
As the wait lengthens for Hollow Knight: Silksong, other Soulsy creature features are scurrying to fill the breach. We had Deviator last week - now, it's time for a bumper helping of the heebie-jeebies in the shape of Perennial Order. The title makes it sound like an eBay delivery of potted geraniums. The game festering beneath is actually a "plant horror" boss rusher with twin stick melee controls, unlockable "Instinct" abilities and one-hit deaths.
In a gift to headline writers everywhere, the developers, four-person Gardenfiend Games, are calling it "Hollow Knight meets Titan Souls", and who am I to deny them? It's got one of those "painterly" art styles, too, though other words come to mind, such as "rotted" and "unhallowed" and "manky". It's out on 6th September. Find a trailer nested below this paragraph like a venus flytrap poised to clamp around your fingers.

 
Read more
articles.title: Plant horror boss rusher Perennial Order is an oozing hybrid of Hollow Knight and Titan Souls

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
Okay, listen. The Roads To Power expansion coming to Crusader Kings III is focusing on the Byzantine Empire. But forget that. Because today developers Paradox revealed the ins and outs of another feature from the DLC that is way more exciting than some fusty old Greeks. It's called "landless adventurers" and it'll let you play as disgraced dirtbag travelling the world in a sort of medieval gig economy. You'll be making camp, gathering followers, taking random jobs from local rulers, and catching infectious diseases as you try to travel safely through war-torn regions. It sounds amazing.
Read more
articles.title: Crusader Kings 3's "landless adventurers" are set to offer a whole new way of playing the medieval trouble sim

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
I don't play much Call Of Duty any more. My feelings about the series have settled back from self-righteous fury over its Pentagon-sponsored war-fellating to a quieter, regretful sense that there have maybe been enough Call Of Duty games now, and that it would be nice if we could fill that infamous late October/early November release slot with, I don't know, games about witches instead, or maybe just turn it into a public holiday and spend the week lying on a mattress regarding the ceiling. Still: I've skinned and filleted enough COD in my time to know that Black Ops 6's new "omnimovement" system is going to ruffle as many feathers as it smooths. The short version is that it turns you into Max Payne.
 
Read more
articles.title: Black Ops 6 leak gives naughty players access to the Max Payne-ish omnimovement system for the first time

articles.author: Ed Thorn
articles.description:
In his Vampire Survivors review, Matt Cox described the game as something he could play with "one hand in a packet of crisps". I think about this quite often, actually, as someone whose largely offline friends (or Fortnite/FIFA pals) ask me to recommend them a game that's good or interesting. Show them something popular like Elden Ring and, despite its grandeur, it might prove too much in all facets. But Vampire Survivors? It's an easy sell: simple, digestible, ridiculous value.
All of this is to say, One BTN Bosses is from the same school of the easy sell. You can fight bosses with one hand in a packet of pickled onion Space Raiders, after all.
Read more
articles.title: One BTN Bosses' rhythmic rush is an easy sell, since you can play it with one hand in a packet of crisps

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
You’re dead at the start of rhythm-combat  RPG Nocturne, just arrived in some sort of afterlife waiting room after the apparent extinction of humanity. You get your bearings, and you soon meet up with another, only slightly irritating, small child. His name is Kimothy, which sounds like something you’d only say as a joke to annoy friends named Kim, and then only once because it would be stupid to say it again. It’s fine! Leaves flutter, rays of sun cavort through trees, and the music is utterly gorgeous. The game opens on twinkly piano and mournful strings, infused with a good dose of stirring JRPG whimsy, and soon transforms into whatever the genre of music is called that makes you want to immediately go on a massive adventure. Potion-punk. Slime-swing. Limit breakcore etc.
Read more
articles.title: Chrono Trigger meets Guitar Hero was not on my bingo card, but I’ll take it regardless

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
Is early adoption a chump’s game? I dunno about that, though between the Asus ROG Ally X and the Steam Deck OLED, those who stayed their hand on their earlier handheld gaming PC counterparts do have a couple of quality second-genners to choose from. Valve’s effort manages to wring multiple performance, design, and battery life improvements out of its new display, while the ROG Ally X makes similar upgrades with a bigger-yet-better take on the original ROG Ally.
The only thing to do, clearly, is make them fight. It’s probably in the Irish Code Duello or something: "Should one portable games box impugn another’s honour by releasing shortly after it, satisfaction must be claimed through a comparison article." My hands are bound here, folks, though if you yourself have been playing the waiting game on a handheld purchase, perhaps this little head-to-head can help you pick the right one.
Read more
articles.title: Asus ROG Ally X vs Steam Deck OLED: battle of the beefed-up handhelds

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Cinematic platformer Bionic Bay opens on a scene of a very large egg doing very bad things - easily my third favourite genre of speculative fiction. You awake to a world of tree trunks that twist like viscera and corroded contraptions powered by luminous goop that’s stored in the balls, uh, big glass orbs. A beam of light soon fills your character with newfound vigour, which is a nice moment of triumph in what otherwise feels like a deeply oppressive rust pit, all unsteady platforms and jagged pipes.
It doesn’t take long before you start spotting examples of the reason Bionic Bay went viral earlier this week. Above your head hangs a painstakingly detailed mass of vents and cables, looming lifelike with dust and shadow and history. I stood and stared because I’d seen how the sausage was made, but I like to think I would have lingered longer than usual anyway. It really is just that impressive.
Read more
articles.title: Cinematic platformer Bionic Bay is incredibly impressive even beyond its 250,000 pixel trees

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Dnes si popíšeme pokročilejší grafické operace podporované kartou VGA, které dokáží ušetřit práci CPU. Jedná se o horizontální i vertikální scrolling, podporu pro double i tripple buffering a taktéž o režim rozdělené obrazovky.
articles.title: Grafické operace přímo podporované čipy karty VGA

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: ČD - Telematika)
articles.description: Dnes se podíváme na nově vydané šifrovací standardy NIST, statistiky DDoS útoků za první pololetí roku 2024, potenciální kyberšpionáž v Rusku a zranitelnosti v produktech od Microsoftu.
articles.title: Postřehy z bezpečnosti: kvantové šifrování, rekordní DDoS útoky a nové zranitelnosti

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Redox OS představil nový webový server a schopnost vytvářet binární soubory. Vývojáři Debianu vylepšují a zrychlují správce balíčků APT. Vydání Ubuntu 24.04.1 LTS muselo být odloženo kvůli objevení řady chyb.
articles.title: Redox OS má webový server, Debianu vylepšuje APT

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Podpora AMD Smart Data Cache Injection, KDE a správa barev na Waylandu, Ubuntu s X.Org v samostatném balíčku, TI postaví továrny za miliardy,
articles.title: Kim Dotcom bude vydán do USA, herní engine Godot s podporou Waylandu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Desítky dílčích testů ilustrují jedno: AMD s novým Ryzenem 9 9950X opět odskakuje Intelu i sama sobě a posouvá hranice možného o notný kus vpřed. Podívejme se na celý velký test v souvislostech.
articles.title: AMD Ryzen 9 9950X: test potvrdil nového krále PC světa

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Lukáš Kotek)
articles.description: Provozovat FreeDOS ve virtuálním stroji už umíme. Následující text popisuje retro notebook Pocket 386, zprovoznění FreeDOSu na něm a množství drobných tipů a triků nejen ohledně české lokalizace.
articles.title: Pocket 386: FreeDOS na malém notebooku se spoustou konektorů

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Na článek, v němž jsme se zabývali základní problematikou modelů provádějících klasifikaci dat, dnes navážeme. Ukážeme si jeden z modelů, jenž namísto klasifikace provádí regresi. Jedná se o model lineární regresní analýzy.
articles.title: Balíček scikit-learn: modely provádějící regresní analýzu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Sonda do světa otevřeného softwaru. Dnes si představíme aplikaci pro vyhledávání obsahu souborů, vyzkoušíme kalkulačku z Windows na Linuxu, řekneme si o novém webovém prohlížeči a zazálohujeme si systém.
articles.title: Softwarová sklizeň (14. 8. 2024): hledejte v obsahu svých souborů

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Po popisu standardních textových i grafických režimů karty VGA se zaměříme na popis režimů nestandardních. Bude se z velké části jednat o různé úpravy grafického režimu 13H s rozlišením 320×200 pixelů a s 256 barvami.
articles.title: Nestandardní grafické režimy karty VGA

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: CESNET CERTS)
articles.description: V dnešním díle Postřehů se podíváme na zranitelnost 0.0.0.0 Day, ztrátu dat z tisíců školních zařízení, ransomware BlackSuit, zranitelnost v PostgreSQL a další zajímavosti z uplynulého týdne.
articles.title: Postřehy z bezpečnosti: zranitelnost 0.0.0.0 Day a ztráta dat z tisíců školních zařízení

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: O open source strategii v reálném čase Beyond All Reason (BAR) jsme tu před dvěma roky psali.  Je inspirovaná hrou Total Anihiliation z roku 1997.
articles.title: Open source RTS Beyond All Reason má nový trailer

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Zajímá vás moderní přístup ke službám a témata jako Docker, kontejnery, cloud, virtualizace a Kubernetes? Připravili jsme pro vás čtyřdenní kurz Docker s Kubernetes, na který můžete získat dotaci až 82 % od Úřadu práce. Kontaktujte naši kolegyni pavla.hettnerova@iinfo.cz.
articles.title: Čtyřdenní kurz Docker s Kubernetes dotovaný Úřadem práce

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Dnes vyšlo Raspberry Pi 5 s 2 GB RAM. Jde o levnější variantu již prodávaných Raspberry Pi 5 s 4 a 8 GB RAM. Jednak se ušetřilo na menší paměti a také použitý SoC Broadcom BCM2712 má nový stepping D0. Funkčně je shodný s předchozím BCM2712, jen byl vynechán nepoužívaný křemík, čímž se také ušetřilo.
articles.title: Levnější Raspberry Pi 5 s 2 GB RAM

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Windows 11 Build 27686, který se dostal minulý čtvrtek do Insider kanálů, bude schopen formátovat oddíly FAT32  větší než 32 GB. Zatím tedy jen z příkazové řádky.
articles.title: Windows 11 budou nově moci formátovat FAT32 větší než 32 GB

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Ibrahim Al-Nasser ze Saúdské Arábie má Guinnessův rekord v co největším počtu herních konzolí připojených k jedinému televizoru. Připojeno jich bylo 444. Přitom použil více než 12 HDMI přepínačů a přes 30 cinch přepínačů pro starší konzole. Zatímco HDMI přepínače se automaticky propojí, stačí jen zapnout konzoli, s přepínáním cinchů je to složitější.
articles.title: Guinnessův rekord: 444 herních konzolí připojených k jedinému televizoru

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Klasickou RPG Diablo včetně rozšíření Hellfire je možné hrát v prohlížeči díky projektu Diabloweb. Ten je založen na starším projektu Devilution.
articles.title: Diablo je možné hrát v prohlížeči

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Bývalí vývojáři Blizzardu vytvořili strategii v reálném čase Stormgate. Ta je nyní na Steamu v předběžném přístupu zdarma. Je sice jen pro Windows, ale podle všeho funguje dobře v Linuxu s Protonem 9.0–2.
articles.title: Bývalí vývojáři Blizzardu vytvořili RTS Stormgate, je v předběžném přístupu zdarma

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Uzavřený populární multiplatformní benchmark Geekbench pro Linux, macOS, Windows, Android a iOS patrně znáte. V roce 2013 se o něm nelichotivě vyjadřoval i Linus Torvalds. Nově byl včera vydán Geekbench AI 1.0, který testuje výkon pro zátěže typu umělé inteligence a strojového učení. Pro macOS, Linux a Windows jsou na oficiální stránce. Pro iOS a Android v obchodě s aplikacemi.
articles.title: Geekbench AI testuje rychlost vašeho počítače či telefonu pro AI

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: První opravné vydání Ubuntu 24.04.1 LTS mělo podle plánu vyjít již tento týden. Objevilo se však pět závažných chyby v aktualizačním procesu a proto bude vydání opožděno o dva týdny.
articles.title: Ubuntu 24.04.1 LTS vyjde až koncem měsíce

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Chcete se stát datovým analytikem s přesahem do datového inženýrství a v budoucnu se věnovat třeba i strojovému učení či AI? Pak je tu pro vás půlroční intenzivní kurz Datový analytik s Pythonem, kterým vás jednou týdně ve 24 lekcích provedou zkušení lektoři s komerční praxí.
articles.title: Staňte se datovým analytikem s Pythonem (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Chcete se stát odborníky na monitoring pomocí systému Zabbix? Nabízíme pětidenní kurz Zabbix, který probíhá online a je zaměřen na řešení praktických problémů. Kurz je dotován Úřadem práce, od kterého můžete získat až 82 % ceny kurzu. Kontaktujte naši kolegyni pavla.hettnerova@iinfo.cz.
articles.title: Pětidenní kurz Zabbix dotovaný Úřadem práce

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Společnost Intel prodala během druhého čtvrtletí celý svůj podíl ve společnosti Arm Holdings, jak vyplývá z úterní zprávy pro americkou Komisi pro cenné papíry. Společnost rovněž prodala svůj podíl ve společnosti ZeroFox, která se zabývá kybernetickou bezpečností, a snížila podíl ve společnosti Astera Labs, která vyvíjí platformy pro připojení firem.
articles.title: Intel prodal podíl ve společnosti Arm přibližně za 147 milionů dolarů

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Americký Národní institut pro standardy a technologie (NIST) dnes zveřejnil dlouho očekávané standardy postkvantového šifrování, které mají chránit elektronické informace do vzdálené budoucnosti, kdy se dá očekávat, že kvantové počítače prolomí stávající kryptografické algoritmy. Už dlouho se hovoří o tom, že by takové stroje mohly být k dispozici za deset let.
articles.title: NIST dokončil trojici standardů postkvantového šifrování

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Distribuce Gentoo byla jednou z posledních linuxových distribucí, která stále ještě udržovala podporu pro architekturu Itanium (IA-64). Podpora v linuxovém světě ale postupně mizí na mnoha úrovních včetně jádra operačního systému nebo překladače GCC. Nyní i vývojáři Gentoo oznámili konec.
articles.title: Gentoo ukončuje podporu architektury Itanium IA-64

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Tři roky po původním vydání končí pravidelná bezpečnostní podpora Debianu 11 s kódovým označením Bullseye. Tým dlouhodobé podpory Debianu (LTS) převzal bezpečnostní podporu od týmů pro bezpečnost a pro vydání. Bullseye LTS bude podporován od 15. srpna 2024 do 31. srpna 2026.
articles.title: Bezpečnostní podpora pro Debian Bullseye předána týmu LTS

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Až 256 procesorových jader typu RISC-V nabídne nově ohlášená produktová řada P870-D od RISC-V. Cílí pochopitelně na datacentra či obecně serverové využití. Vedle obvyklé výbavy SiFive hovoří explicitně o podpoře pro AI/HPC či podpoře CXL (Compute Express Link) a CHI chip to chip (C2C).
articles.title: SiFive ohlašuje 256jádrový RISC-V procesor P870-D, dostupnost ještě v roce 2024

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Na Open-Source Firmware Conference (OSFC) konané v německé Bochumi 3. až 5. září tohoto roku bude přítomna i AMD a dozvíme se nové detaily k dlouhodobým firemním plánům kolem open-source firmwarů. Řeč tedy bude o běžícím projektu openSIL, který jednoho dne nahradí dosud používaný systém AGESA.
articles.title: AMD podrobněji k openSIL začátkem září na konferenci

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Nová řada telefonů Google Pixel 9 míří na český trh a jednotlivé modely se budou v distribuci postupně objevovat v nejbližších týdnech. Google zde nadále sází na osvědčenou konstrukci, OLED displeje, vlastní ARM SoC nové generace Tensor G4 s rychlejším zpracováním všeho včetně AI. Pixely 9 budou mimochodem softwarově podporovány 7 let.
articles.title: Google uvedl Pixel 9 / Pro / Pro XL, hodinky Pixel Watch 3 a sluchátka Pixel Buds Pro 2

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Proxmox je moderní virtualizační platforma, která v mnoha případech může nahradit VMware. Je open-source, zdarma a je postaven na otevřených technologiích jako KVM, LXC, CEPH a dalších. Pokud potřebujete provozovat virtualizaci, Proxmox je pro vás ideální stack a na našem workshopu Proxmox se dozvíte, jak na něj.
articles.title: Proxmox: moderní virtualizační platforma schopná nahradit VMware (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Hrach)
articles.description: Série esejí Situational awareness: The Decade Ahead od bývalého zaměstnance OpenAI (PDF, 165 stran) se zamýšlí nad možným scénářem nejbližšího vývoje umělé inteligence.
articles.title: Situační uvědomění: vývoj AI

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Hned dvě úpravy kódu zaměřující se na vlekoucí se bolístku desktopového prostředí GNOME jsou připraveny k testování. GNOME už nějakou dobu trpí za určitých okolností na trhající se kurzor myši, například v situacích, kdy se nic jiného na desktopu nehýbe.
articles.title: Vývojáři GNOME se zaměřují na trhající se kurzor myši

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Čerstvý kód do projektů ovladačů AGX Gallium3D a Honeykrisp vznikajících pod křídly Asahi Linuxu zase o kus silou svých 42 patchů posouvá kvalitu implementace OpenGL a Vulkan pro „Křemíky“ od Apple. Kód je součástí Gitové větve, z níž vzejde budoucí Mesa 24.3.
articles.title: Aktualizace OpenGL a Vulkan ovladačů pro Apple Silicon míří do Mesa 24.3

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Pravidelné nové vydání operačního systému Tails nepřináší mnoho novinek. Tvůrci aktualizovali webový prohlížeč Tor Browser na verzi 13.5.2 (staví na Firefoxu 115.14.0 ESR s backportovanými opravami z Firefoxu 129, plus novější verzi NoScript 11.4.31). Stejně tak pošťáka Thunderbird 115.14.0. Přehled aktualizovaných balíčků s firmwary je pak velmi, velmi obsáhlý.
articles.title: Tails 6.6 aktualizuje mnoho balíčků s firmwary

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Od verze FFmpeg 6.1 je v tomto balíku přítomna podpora hardwarově akcelerovaného dekódování videa skrze rozhraní Vulkan Video. Nyní do Gitu projektu přibyla podpora i pro kódování videa skrze Vulkan Video.
articles.title: FFmpeg nasazuje podporu kódování videa s Vulkan Video

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Vývojáři včera otevřeli hru Anodyne 2: Return to Dust. Je to 3D běhací a skákací hra, která používá Unity. Je stále dostupná na Steamu nyní (do 19 hodin) ještě ve slevě za 7,80 eur.
articles.title: Hra Anodyne 2 dává k dispozici zdrojové kódy

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: AI působí jako katalyzátor ransomwarových útoků, ale i jako jejich brzda. Hybridní již nejsou pouze cloudy, ale i sítě. Westcom 3D LAB demonstruje možnosti integrace bezpečnostních řešení více dodavatelů. Velké jazykové modely by mohly samy pro sebe generovat programy. A k čemu to může být dobré? Povede umělá inteligence k modernizaci finančních služeb?
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Hybridní již nejsou pouze cloudy, ale i sítě

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 33/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Nový model umělé inteligence odhaluje skrytý jazyk DNA. Antropický princip a problém srovnávání nekonečen. Čeští vědci jako první viděli 3D strukturu organického materiálu staršího než Země.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Gravitační vlny by dokázaly prozradit používání warpových pohonů

articles.author: Reklama
articles.description: Ať už horečně hledáte levnou cestu k postavení hového počítače, nebo jen chcete upgradovat stárnoucí kopii Office, tato kolekce nabídky od Goodoffer24.com vám pomůže. Jejich ceny jsou opravdu neuvěřitelné, tak na co čekat?
articles.title: Oficiální cena za Windows 11 Pro je €259 avšak Goodoffer24 účtuje jen €20

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Přehled červencových vydání Jaderných novin: stav vydání jádra, citáty týdne a seznam článků týkajících se jádra.
articles.title: Jaderné noviny – přehled za červenec 2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Řízení rizik může zpomalovat inovace, včetně zavádění AI. Konica Minolta se zaměřila na ochranu firemních dat. Teplotu elektroniky by mohly měřit neutrony, přesně a rychle. Nekonečně velká ochrana stojí nekonečně velké peníze. Průzkum Acronis hlásí 293% nárůst e-mailových útoků.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Teplotu elektroniky by mohly měřit neutrony, přesně a rychle

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 32/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Jak umělá inteligence pomáhá s průzkumem Marsu. Při zapamatování a vybavování se mozkové vlny šíří opačným směrem. Průlom ve vývoji ultrarychlých luminiscenčních materiálů. Kvantové tornádo má zlepšit naše chápání černých děr.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Data z CERNu dále omezují podmínky pro dlouho žijící supersymetrické částice

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Energetika a vodárenství zaznamenaly čtyřnásobné zvýšení průměrných nákladů na obnovu po ransomwaru. Technologie baterií (5): Vědci znovu zkusili baterie s vodou jako elektrolytem. Kam se v AddAI posunuli a kam směřují. Ness představuje Matrix, nástroj na efektivní agilní vývoj. Gordic představil nástroj pro signalizaci rizik u podepisovaných elektronických dokumentů.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Energetika a vodárenství zaznamenaly čtyřnásobné zvýšení průměrných nákladů na obnovu po ransomwaru

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 31/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: V Berkley Lab otevřeli cestu k syntéze prvku 120. Stopy života by se mohly dát najít i u povrchu Europy a Enceladu. Pokročilá teorie informace odhaluje příčiny extrémních jevů (nejen) v počasí. Problém posledního parseku ukazuje souvislost mezi supermasivními černými děrami a temnou hmotou.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Pozoroval změnu chování magnetických momentů v antiferomagnetu

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Společnost AMD kupuje firmu ZT Systems, tj. předního poskytovatele infrastruktury pro umělou inteligenci, za 4,9 miliardy dolarů.
articles.title: Společnost AMD kupuje firmu ZT Systems

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Představeno bylo Raspberry Pi 5 s 2 GB RAM s cenou 50 dolarů.
articles.title: Raspberry Pi 5 s 2 GB RAM

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description:
Nová čísla časopisů od nakladatelství Raspberry Pi:
MagPi 144 (pdf) a
HackSpace 81 (pdf). Samostatný HackSpace číslem 81 skončil. Stane se součástí časopisu MagPi.
articles.title: MagPi 144 a HackSpace 81

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Před 4 roky byla počítačová hra Factorio (Wikipedie), oficiálně běžící také na Linuxu, vydána ve verzi 1.0. Vydání verze 2.0 a velkého vesmírného rozšíření Factorio: Space Age je plánováno na 21. října 2024. Těšit se lze mimo jiné na pětinožce viz Friday Facts #424 (YouTube).
articles.title: Factorio 2.0 a Factorio: Space Age

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Texmaker (Wikipedie), tj. svobodný multiplatformní editor pro psaní dokumentů v LaTeXu, byl vydán ve verzi 6.0.0 (Bluesky). Přehled novinek v ChangeLogu.
articles.title: Texmaker 6.0.0

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Na čem aktuálně pracují vývojáři GNOME a KDE? Pravidelný přehled novinek v Týden v GNOME a Týden v KDE.
articles.title: Týden v GNOME a Týden v KDE (16. srpna 2024)

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Debian slaví 31 let. Ian Murdock oznámil vydání "Debian Linux Release" 16. srpna 1993.
articles.title: Debian slaví 31 let

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Obchod s hrami Epic Games Store je k dispozici na Androidu i iOS. Na Androidu celosvětově, na iOS pouze v Evropské unii.
articles.title: Epic Games Store nově na Androidu i iOS

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Texas Instruments dostane od americké vlády v souladu se zákonem o čipech (CHIPS Act) dotaci 1,6 miliardy dolarů na financování výroby polovodičů v Texasu a Utahu.
articles.title: Texas Instruments dostane dotaci 1,6 miliardy dolarů na financování výroby polovodičů v Texasu a Utahu

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Společnost xAI založena Elonem Muskem představila Grok-2, tj. novou verzi svého AI LLM modelu Grok.
articles.title: Grok-2

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: A new batch of HID subsystem fixes were merged today for the ongoing Linux 6.11 kernel development...
articles.title: ASUS ROG Ally X & GT7868Q See HID Fixes With Linux 6.11

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The FreeBSD open-source operating system project published their Q2'2024 status report that outlines some interesting work happening to this leading BSD project...
articles.title: AMD & FreeBSD Begin Collaborating Over OS Improvements

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: NVIDIA recently sent over their RTX 2000 Ada Generation and RTX 4000 Ada Generation graphics cards suited for designers, engineers, and creative professionals. In my testing the past several weeks these professional graphics cards have been working out with NVIDIA's Linux driver stack -- including their open-source kernel modules now the default with the R555 driver series and later. While there is that previous article looking at how their open-source kernel drivers are at parity to the former proprietary kernel modules, today's article is looking at how the NVIDIA RTX 2000/4000 Ada Generation performance stacks up against the AMD Radeon Pro competition.
articles.title: NVIDIA RTX 2000 & RTX 4000 Ada Generation Linux Performance

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Red Hat engineer Jan Grulich has provided an update today on PipeWire camera handling with the upcoming Fedora 41 release...
articles.title: Fedora 41 To Rely On PipeWire By Default For Firefox Camera Handling

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: GameMode as the open-source daemon from Feral Interactive to optimize Linux system performance on-demand when running games is out with its first release of 2024...
articles.title: Feral's GameMode 1.8.2 Fixes Hybrid CPU Core Pinning

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: If you are picking up one of the new AMD Ryzen 9000 series desktop processors soon for Linux use, you may be wondering whether it's worthwhile or even necessary moving to the latest Linux kernel code compared to the likes of Ubuntu 24.04 LTS that are shipping a Linux 6.8 derived kernel. Here are some quick benchmarks in looking at that question...
articles.title: Linux 6.11 Kernel Performance On The AMD Ryzen 9 9000 Series

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: To date the Raspberry Pi 5 single board computer has been offered with either 4GB or 8GB of system memory. The Raspberry Pi 5 4GB has retailed for $60 USD while the Raspberry Pi 5 8GB at $80 USD. For those needing something a little cheaper and not needing as much system memory, the Raspberry Pi 5 2GB model launched today...
articles.title: Raspberry Pi 5 2GB Launches At $50 USD

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: AMD just announced that they have entered into a definitive agreement to acquire ZT Systems, a hyperscale solutions provider focused on AI...
articles.title: AMD Acquiring Another Company To Bolster Its AI Play

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The fourth weekly release candidate of Linux 6.11 is now available for testing...
articles.title: Linux 6.11-rc4 Released: "Nothing Feels All That Odd"

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Arch Linux powered CachyOS that is known for its performance optimizations and other enhancements is out with its "August 2024" rolling release update...
articles.title: Arch Linux Based CachyOS Switches To Open NVIDIA Kernel Modules, COSMIC Desktop Option

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: While Linus Torvalds was hoping to merge the sched_ext extensible scheduler for the Linux v6.11 kernel cycle, that didn't end up happening after some technical issues were raised on the kernel mailing list. Since then though the kernel developers have been collaborating and given the latest sched_ext patches with "for-next" and "for-6.12" markings, it's looking like the extensible scheduler will be attempted again for the Linux 6.12 merge window...
articles.title: It's Looking Like sched_ext Will Try Again To Land For Linux 6.12

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Ahead of the Linux 6.11-rc4 kernel release coming up later today, some more Bcachefs file-system patches were merged this weekend for this experimental copy-on-write file-system...
articles.title: Bcachefs Merges New On-Disk Format Version For Linux 6.11, Working Toward Defrag

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Faith Ekstrand has merged another two dozen patches for the open-source NVIDIA "NVK" Vulkan driver with next quarter's Mesa 24.3...
articles.title: More NVK Driver Improvements Merged For Mesa 24.3

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Lab Wayland Compositor "labwc" v0.8 is now available as the newest release of this Wayland compositor that has been re-based against the wlroots 0.18 Wayland library...
articles.title: Lab Wayland Compositor 0.8 Released, Ported To wlroots 0.18

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Vulkan 1.3.293 released on Friday as the newest specification for this industry standard graphics and compute API. In addition to a handful of fixes/clarifications, Vulkan 1.3.293 introduces a new NVIDIA vendor extension...
articles.title: Vulkan 1.3.293 Released With NVIDIA Command Buffer Inheritance Extension

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Following the recent work to Mutter and GNOME Shell that was merged for allowing to build with X11 support disabled, the GDM display manager and GNOME-Session code have also seen the ability added to compile without X11 support...
articles.title: GNOME Session & GDM Can Now Be Built Without X11 Support

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Archinstall is the wonderful command-line driven installer that was introduced to the Arch Linux ISOs three years ago for making it quicker and easier to get a customized Arch Linux installation. Out today is Archinstall 2.8.2 to further refine that experience...
articles.title: Archinstall 2.8.2 To Speed Up Arch Linux Installations, Other Fixes

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: KDE developer Nate Graham is out with his weekly recap that highlights all of the interesting KDE desktop changes to have landed over the past week...
articles.title: KDE Implements More Wayland Bits, Lowers Bug Count To Match Plasma 5 Stability

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: AMD Linux engineers are preparing the kernel for Smart Data Cache Injection (SDCI) as a feature for AMD EPYC server processors. Smart Data Cache Injection is a nifty new feature that allows for direct insertion of data from I/O devices into the CPU's L2/L3 cache...
articles.title: AMD Preparing Linux For Smart Data Cache Injection With "Upcoming" CPUs

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: With all of my AMD Ryzen 9900X and 9950X Linux benchmarking and Ryzen 5 9600X and Ryzen 7 9700X reviews as well, many have wondered if AMD Zen 5 is just really great on Linux, if Windows 11 is in particularly poor shape for these new AMD Ryzen 9000 series processors, if it's just the different/diverse benchmarks being run, or simply why are these new desktop CPUs running so well on Linux but less so with Windows?
articles.title: Windows 11 vs. Ubuntu 24.04 Linux Performance For The AMD Ryzen 9 9950X

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Oliver Smith as the Interim Engineering Director for the Ubuntu desktop provided an update around recent efforts on Ubuntu 24.10...
articles.title: Canonical Makes More Snap Improvements Ahead Of Ubuntu 24.10

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The Cloud Hypervisor open-source project that serves as a Rust-written VMM focused on security and started by Intel but now backed by a multitude of vendors is out with its newest feature release. Cloud Hypervisor 41 is the new feature release worked on by engineers at Intel, Google, Microsoft, Rivos, Tencent, Ant Group, and others for this cloud and security minded virtual machine monitor...
articles.title: Cloud Hypervisor 41 Brings Performance Improvements & Landlock Sandboxing

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Ahead of the now in-place Ubuntu 24.10 feature freeze, the Ubuntu GNOME X.Org session support was split off into its own separate binary Debian package from the main (default) Wayland session handling...
articles.title: Ubuntu's X.Org Session Support Now Split Into Separate Package

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The Vulkan Video support within Mesa's Radeon "RADV" Vulkan driver continues to be improved upon. The newest addition now found in the code for Mesa 24.3 is enabling 12-bit AV1 content accelerated decoding...
articles.title: Radeon "RADV" Vulkan Driver Now Handles 12-bit AV1 Video Decoding

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Sent out today was the latest round of DRM-Misc-Next patches to DRM-Next ahead of the Linux 6.12 merge window opening up in mid-September. For those using ARM single board computers with a Rockchip SoC and have been struggling for 4K support over HDMI, the Rockchip updates in Linux 6.12 should excite you...
articles.title: Rockchip Driver Will Be Able To Drive 4K @ 60Hz HDMI Displays With Linux 6.12

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: For improving the open-source graphics driver support for Qualcomm Adreno 700 series hardware such as what's found in the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 and other SoCs, preemption support is finally being tackled...
articles.title: Preemption Support Being Tackled For Adreno 700 Series With Linux MSM DRM Driver

articles.description: With the AMD Ryzen 9 9900X and Ryzen 9 9950X Linux review out of the way yesterday, today's benchmarking of the Ryzen 9000 series is looking closely at the AVX-512 performance impact. With the Ryzen 9000 series the Zen 5 cores have a full 512-bit data-path compared to the "double pumped" 256-bit data path found in the Zen 4 processors as well as the Strix Point SKUs. In this article is an AVX-512 enabled versus disabled comparison for not only the Ryzen 9 9950X but also the prior generation Ryzen 9 7950X and looking too at the CPU power use, thermals, and peak frequency when engaging a variety of AVX-512 workloads.
articles.title: Quantifying The AVX-512 Performance Impact With AMD Zen 5 - Ryzen 9 9950X Benchmarks

articles.description:
If you play your cards right, Guangzhi will be the first boss fight you run into in Black Myth: Wukong. This unfortunate creature began life as a wolf but yearned to be so much more. This is how to beat him.


How to beat Guangzhi in Black Myth: Wukong


The key to beating any boss in Black Myth: Wukong is to understand their moveset. If you are not surprised by the things they do, you can easily control the fight. It is worth highlighting here one of the largest differences between early Black Myth: Wukong gameplay and other similar games. If you over-commit, you are dead. Definitely don't spam the dodge button, and don't spam heavy attacks. If you get caught up in those animations, you are gonna lose a lot of health.


Another thing to keep in mind about Guangzhi is that he will build up…

Lingxuzi is the first really monstrous-sized boss you will run into in Black Myth: Wukong. He is guarding the ruins of an old temple, so prepare to say your prayers while you fight for your life.


How to beat Lingxuzi in Black Myth: Wukong


You can find Lingxuzi, the wolf demon, at the Guanyin Temple in Black Myth: Wukong. Honestly, he is not a particularly tough fight because of one major consideration that the devs have taken into account when designing his moves.


Unlike some bosses in other games, this guy spends a lot of his time repositioning. It means some very nice damage windows. He also appears to have been designed to try to stay away from the outside of the arena, so he never really tries to push you into a corner through raw aggression. Not every boss in the game will affor…

He will drop an item you won't even be able to pick until you have the Spirit upgrade for your Gourd, and you can just sneak around him if you want to. That said, if you want to kick his butt, there are some patterns you should really watch out for.



Fire is pretty good against this guy, so if you wish, go and face Guangzhi first. You will earn an interesting ability when you defeat him, which will be very useful in this fight, giving you access to a powerful spell that transforms you into Guangzhi, giving you…

While exploring Squall Hideout near Fright Cliff in Black Myth Wukong, you may come across a man trapped in stone. You can help him out, but be careful, because he is a tricky little devil.

You can find the man trapped in stone in a ravine just at the foot of the scaffolding on the right side of the Fright Cliff area, near the Squall Hideout. Drop down and talk to him, but beware, as the drop can take quite a bit of health.


After you speak to him, he will tell you that he has been imprisoned in the terrible rock and that all around him are cursed stone monsters. He is not wrong about that last bit, so be careful as you explore the area. To free the man, you will need to go and fetch an item from a nearby boss, although it …

articles.author: Aidan O'Brien
articles.description:
An early question you might be asking in Black Myth: Wukong is whether you should ring the bell after beating Guagnzhi, the fire spear-wielding maniac.


Should you ring the bell in Black Myth: Wukong?


The answer is yes; you should ring the bell. Not only should you ring this bell, but there are two other bells that you should ring. Doing so will whisk you away to a secret location, where you can find a very useful item indeed.


I have a full guide on each bell location, but I shall also give you some brief info here, as it would be rude not to. You can stay playing through the game until you reach the following two bosses, each of which will have a bell nearby.



Guangmou - this fight comes just after the Snake Trail area in Bamboo Groove. When the fight is over, make your way up the stone steps to the next bell.


Whiteclad Noble - this fight is in Marsh of White Mist, once again in the Bamboo Groove area. When the Noble is down, head left into the cave, not through the ruined building. Take out the enemies there and ring the bell.



This will whisk you away to the secret Ancient Guanyin Temple, where you will need to fight and beat the Elder  Jinchi. This fight is a variant of the Wandering Wight fight, with one major difference. From time to time, the Elder Jinchi will float in the area, drawing in the thralls below to heal himself.


Focus on taking out the thralls and eventually, he will drop to the ground, and you can get to work on him again. When he is down, you will get the Fireproof Mantle, which will be very useful later in the game.

The post Should you ring the bell after fighting Guangzhi in Black Myth: Wukong appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Should you ring the bell after fighting Guangzhi in Black Myth: Wukong

articles.author: Paula Vaynshteyn
articles.description:
KRAFTON's up and coming competitor to The Sims 4, inZOI, is due for release later in 2024, but the Character Studio demo will be available to play for five days starting on August 21. If you’re wondering whether your rig can handle the game, here’s what you need to know. 


inZOI looks undeniably fantastic. Early displays of gameplay show a fully immersive world where you can alter and control almost everything from the state of the city, to the animals who wander around, to the weather. 


All of this without mentioning the frankly genius use of generative AI to customize not only yourself, but the world around you… inZOI looks truly promising. You can even upload photos of things from the real world and inZOI will present you with an in-game 3D sculpt of said item to use in game. 


But with all of those features comes some fairly hefty system requirements, so can your computer run the game? Let’s find out.


inZOI minimum PC requirements


To simply dive in and play inZOI without necessarily having your visual settings at their highest, you’ll need to meet the following system requirements:




Operating System: Windows 10/11 64-bit


Processor: Intel i5 10400 / AMD Ryzen 3600


Memory: 12 GB RAM


Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 (8G VRAM) / AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT


DirectX: Version 12


Storage: 60 GB available space




inZOI recommended PC requirements


If you’re wanting to turn all settings up to their highest and enjoy inZOI in the best state possible, you’ll need to meet the following requirements:




Operating System: Windows 10/11 64-bit


Processor: Intel i7 12700 / AMD Ryzen 5800


Memory: 16 GB RAM


Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3070 (8G VRAM) / AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT


DirectX: Version 12


Storage: 75 GB available space



The post inZOI minimum and recommended PC system requirements appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: inZOI minimum and recommended PC system requirements

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
If you're the type of Madden NFL 25 player who likes options, the Run-Pass Option (RPO) could be right up your alley.


This play call is a bit different from a static, defined run or pass option. Rather than commit to a single play, you head to the line of scrimmage with the option for both, depending on how the defense reacts. As attractive as it sounds, mastering this particular play can be difficult. First, let's take a look at the controls.


How to perform the Run-Pass Option (RPO) in Madden NFL 25


A key to this play is to quickly decide between two post-snap options - run the ball, or pass it to one of your receivers. The controls will vary accordingly.



Press A/X to perform the snap.


If you want the RB to run with the ball, don't press any button. Your RB will automatically grab the ball post-snap and run with it.


If you want the ball to be passed, press your receiver's button post-snap. This will perform a pass. Make sure to do this before the RB receives the ball. 



Image via Destructoid


As I said, mastering an RPO isn't very easy. There are several aspects of pulling off the play successfully. A significant advantage offered by the RPO is the fact that you're not locked to any particular play. You need to observe the opposition's defense and choose whether you want to go with the run or pass option.


If you see that your receivers are being guarded tightly, it's better to run with the ball. Chances are that the defense, which is focusing on the wide receivers, could leave spaces for runs. Similarly, it's better to pass if your running channels appear blocked, due to congestion in the middle.


The RPO is an effective, flexible option if you're looking to keep the defense on their toes. Make sure to put some reps in on this, and try it out in your next match.

The post How to use the Run-Pass Option (RPO) in Madden 25 appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to use the Run-Pass Option (RPO) in Madden 25

However, if another person does this before you, you'll have to see if they left the gauntlets on the ground or travel the map looking for them…

articles.author: Shawn Robinson
articles.description:
The Destiny 2 Solstice of Heroes event has been in full swing for some time now, offering a ton of new weapons and armor from its Bonfire Bash activity and other tasks. Among those new activities include bounties to claim and complete, tasking you with farming Silver Leaves.


It's a bit tedious, but not a difficult chore. To that end, here is the best way to farm Silver Leaves in Destiny 2. 


Where to farm Silver Leaves in Destiny 2


Screenshot by Destructoid


The best place to farm Silver Leaves in Destiny 2 is, oddly enough, public events. These are the little events that show up across certain open-world zones, as shown above. Simply head to the designated location and complete the public event with other players, and within just a few minutes, you'll earn Silver Leaves. You'll receive more if you make the public event heroic, but will inevitably take a bit longer.


If you get tired of running those, the next best method is running numerous strikes through the Vanguard Ops playlist. These last five to 10 minutes a piece and reward five Silver Leaves when completing them. It's not the most efficient, but it's a lot less tedious than running public event after public event. It may help if you weave these into each other, too.


There is, technically, one easier way than either of these methods, but it's rather boring and requires you to semi-AFK. To do it, set up a private match of Control in Crucible and set the required score to 25. Then, simply go capture a point and wait for the game to end. Once it does, you'll get some Silver Leaves without having to work for it. Again, it's pretty boring, but if you want to AFK it, then this is your best bet.

The post Best way to farm Silver Leaves in Destiny 2 appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Best way to farm Silver Leaves in Destiny 2

articles.author: Elliott Gatica
articles.description:
With Dr. Doom the focal point of the current Fortnite season, players will have to confront one of the better-known antagonists from Marvel Comics. However, those with a keen eye who play fighting games may notice that Doom has an attack hearkening back to his Marvel vs. Capcom (MvC) days.


Players partaking in the new Absolute Doom season are feeling the wrath of the very notorious "foot dive" move he performs in Marvel vs. Capcom 3. On Twitter, user CaptainGalxy highlighted Dr. Doom's signature hit as it appears in Fortnite — and it looks like plenty of folks have nostalgia for it. 




It seems like Victor von Doom leaps into the air, charges up with a glowing green aura, and announces his attack with an insult-to-injury "you're beneath me" quip. Take the hit or move out of the way, as it won't kill you, but it will disorient you from its pushback. This has to be an intentional nod to the Marvel vs. Capcom fighting game franchise.


With the resurgence of the Marvel fighting games, namely the first two, this obvious nod to the franchise is just what we need to keep the momentum going. What better way is there to build hype than to possibly reenact the iconic moments between characters who appear in these older titles and who are now in Fortnite?  


As someone who puts dozens of hours a month into fighting games, this crossover, especially with its detailed fan-service additions, make the new season of Fortnite that much more enticing to hop back into. This really is the “New Age of Heroes” in a different coat of paint. Hopefully, some of these collaborations bring those who aren’t even into Fortnite out, at least to see how far it has evolved since the “OG” days.

The post Fortnite’s Dr. Doom gets his MvC foot dive in the latest season appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Fortnite’s Dr. Doom gets his MvC foot dive in the latest season

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
One of the new items in Meme Sea is the Sussy Orb, a rare item that is used to summon the Lord Sus raid boss at the Sus Altar. The Among Us-themed Raid Boss is Level 1550 and worth defeating. Here is how to get the Sussy Orb in Meme Sea and the best way to farm it.





How to farm the Sussy Orb in Meme Sea


The Sussy Orb in Meme Sea can be obtained as a rare drop from Red Sus enemies and the Sus Duck, two enemies found on Sus Island. The Sussy Orb has a 5% chance to drop each time you kill a Red Sus or Sus Duck enemy.


If you're looking for the absolute best way to farm the Sussy Orb, you'll want to head to either the part of Sus Island where lots of Red Sus spawn, or the center square of the town where five Sus Ducks spawn throughout the square. Next, use Floppap Power to AoE all of the enemies at once to kill them. Because there is only a 5% drop for the Sussy Orb, you may need to repeat this for several cycles of spawns because it will typically take 20 kills or so for the Sussy Orb to drop based on its drop chance.


In the town square, five Sus Ducks spawn each time, so you should get the Sussy Orb in about four spawn cycles or so.


How to use the Sussy Orb in Meme Sea


Once you've acquired a Sussy Orb from either the Red Sus or Sus Ducks on Sus Island, you'll then want to head to Forgotten Island. Here you will find the Sus Altar, which is where you use the Sussy Orb. Doing so will spawn the Lord Sus raid boss which is Level 1550 and has 460,000 Health. The Lord Sus has two attacks: a close-range basic attack and Giant Blade, where Lord Sus attacks the player with a falling Giant Sword. He will use Giant Sword every 10 seconds.


Defeating Lord Sus can yield you two possible rare drops: Sus Pals, which is an Among Us-themed accessory with a 10% drop chance, and the Purple Katana weapon that has a 5% drop chance. Both of these are worth farming, so you may need many Sussy Orbs to get both rewards.

The post How to get Sussy Orb in Meme Sea appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to get Sussy Orb in Meme Sea

articles.author: Sourav Banik
articles.description:
The full list of Star Wars Outlaws trophies has been revealed, and there are a lot of them to earn in your entire playthrough.


Star Wars Outlaws is Ubisoft's upcoming open-world action-adventure game, set between the events of The Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi. It follows protagonist Kay Vess, as she makes a life amongst the stars in a galaxy far, far away. A scoundrel's life, that is.


How many Star Wars Outlaws trophies are there?


Star Wars Outlaws will have 50 trophies in total. This consists of 1 Platinum, 2 Gold, 11 Silver, and 36 Bronze trophies.


Screenshot via Star Wars Outlaws' website


List of every Star Wars Outlaws trophy


The table below mentions every Star Wars Outlaws trophy to earn:


Trophy Name
Task
Trophy Rarity




Outlaws
Unlock all Star Wars Outla…
articles.title: Full Star Wars Outlaws trophy list

articles.author: Chris Penwell
articles.description:
The much-anticipated Silent Hill 2 Remake will be getting a "reworked" soundtrack from the game's reprising composer Akira Yamaoka. Announced at a preview event, Yamaoka confirms that the songs have been made from the "ground up."


"There are segments and bits and pieces of the original tracks that you can hear, but all of the tracks have been reworked from the ground up," explained Yamaoka to GameSpot. "I understand that the soundtrack is very much beloved, but ultimately I composed over nine hours worth of music and I'm still wondering how in the world we are going to fit all of that into a soundtrack."




GameSpot's coverage of the Silent Hill 2 Remake preview was pretty positive, which should be reassuring for those holding out hope for the Remake. As the site reports in its preview:…
articles.title: Silent Hill 2 Remake will have a ‘reworked’ soundtrack

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
The New 8-Bit Heroes held a stream to make some announcements about their NESMaker development platform. They covered (among other things) details about the upcoming version 5 update, announced that it will soon be retitled to Retro Game Forge, and revealed that support for SNES game development is on the way.


What interested me, personally, was the demonstration of the platform’s version 5 update. It has been resting at version 4.5.9 since 2020. At its current version, it’s still a capable program that allows you to craft games for the Nintendo Entertainment System using modular code and a variety of tools that simplify the process. However, I could see room for improvement, and what they showed off is definitely that.


The stream lingers mostly on the art editor, which is getting a nu…
articles.title: NESMaker shows off version 5, is getting renamed, and announces SNES tools

articles.author: Daniel Morris
articles.description:
Like many MMOs, Old School RuneScape has a variety of pets that you can collect throughout your adventures across Gielinor. 


These pets are collected through various methods. Some are earned in combat, while others are found while skilling. There are even some Old School RuneScape pets that are obtained in completely different ways, so we're separating our Tier Lists by category as a result.


Image via Jagex


Old School RuneScape Boss Pets Tier List


As you delve deeper into the combat content that Old School RuneScape has to offer, you'll encounter many of its bosses. These bosses are much more difficult than regular monsters, and require you to use all of your resources to bring them down and reap the rewards.


44 of these bosses have a minuscule chance of dropping a boss pet. Thes…
articles.title: Old School RuneScape pets tier list: All OSRS pets, ranked

articles.author: Kristina Ebanez
articles.description:
Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone Season 5 has already kicked off with a bang, bringing the world of WWE to Call of Duty. But the real excitement is yet to come with the mid-season update on the horizon. Here's when to expect the MW3 and Warzone Season 5 Reloaded release, including an inside look into upcoming features.


When does Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone Season 5 Reloaded come out?


According to the Call of Duty Blog, MW3 and Warzone Season 5 Reloaded will launch on August 21, 2024, at 9 a.m. PT/1 p.m. CT/2 p.m. ET. 


Preloads for MW3 and Warzone Season 5 Reloaded will be available the day before or a few hours prior to launch. This convenient feature ensures that you can jump right into the action as soon as the update is live. It should be noted that the Season 5 Reloaded patch will b…
articles.title: MW3 and Warzone Season 5 Reloaded: Release date, final Zombies mission, and new weapons

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Creative Content Australia has new anti-piracy campaign underway alongside the release of its annual Piracy Behaviors and Attitudes survey. In line with current anti-piracy trends, the group hopes to draw attention to the downsides of using pirate sites. "More than two million Australians who admit to visiting illegal streaming sites or pirate sites say they’ve experienced a form of online crime." Let's take a closer look.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Aussie Piracy Survey: ‘Poor Picture’ & ‘Slow Device’ = Cybersecurity Issues

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
U.S. law enforcement authorities appear to have seized several domain names of live sports streaming site Streameast, which is particularly popular in America. A seizure banner accuses the operation of criminal activity and warns of prison sentences. Nevertheless, the site's operators have already made a restart and are vowing to keep going until sports streams are affordable for everyone.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Feds Seize Domain Names of Sports Streaming Site Streameast

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Every week we take a close look at the most pirated movies on torrent sites. What are pirates downloading? 'Twisters' tops the chart, followed by 'Jackpot!'. 'Fly Me To The Moon' completes the top three.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Top 10 Most Pirated Movies of The Week – 08/19/2024

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Almost two years after Radiohead released 'In Rainbows' as a pay-what-you-like album, the track 'These Are My Twisted Words' leaked on private torrent site What.cd. Many believed that the band itself was responsible, something we highlighted in our August 2009 article. Coinciding almost perfectly with the leak's 15-year anniversary, a complaint filed with Google now claims that the report violates copyright law and must be permanently deindexed from search results.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Radiohead ‘Leaked’ Their Own Track in 2009, Now We’re Accused of Pirating It

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
NVIDIA sits front and center of the AI boom. The company provides the much-needed chips and offers its own AI models. NVIDIA admittedly used pirated books to train these models, which triggered a copyright infringement lawsuit. This week, the company informed the court that these claims fall flat, arguing that copyrighted books are nothing more than statistical correlations to its AI models.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: NVIDIA: Copyrighted Books Are Just Statistical Correlations to Our AI Models

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
In December 2022, music industry giants including BMG, UMG, and Capitol, filed a massive copyright infringement lawsuit against Altice, owners of internet service provider Optimum. The complaint followed the familiar 'repeat infringer' format, with damages for works in suit worth over a billion dollars and everything on the line. A joint filing this week reveals that the lawsuit has been dismissed with prejudice, never to see the light of day again.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Billion Dollar Music Piracy Lawsuit Against Optimum is Over, Permanently

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Larissa Knapp, the MPA's new Chief Content Protection Officer, and the team at ACE have announced the shutdown of several US-based pirate IPTV services. The FBI veteran revealed the closure of AnytimeTV plus other pirate brands, and a settlement with three operators worth over $2m. After appearing to disregard the importance of security, shutting down now may have helped to avoid a larger bill, further down the road.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ACE Shuts US-Based Pirate IPTV Services, Poor Security Costs $2m

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Cox Communications has filed a petition at the Supreme Court, requesting a review of a Fourth Circuit ruling that held the company liable for pirating subscribers. While the case is ultimately about service provider liability, the ISP stresses that the current verdict jeopardizes internet access for all Americans, and threatens to cause mass disruption across the internet.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Cox Asks Supreme Court to Protect Internet Subscribers from ‘Piracy Terminations’

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
After years of legal proceedings, New Zealand Justice Minister Paul Goldsmith has approved Kim Dotcom's extradition to the United States. The Megaaupload founder faces criminal copyright infringement, racketeering, and money laundering charges, which in theory could lead to decades in prison. Dotcom says he has a plan and doesn't intend to leave the country.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Kim Dotcom’s Extradition to the U.S. Given Green Light By New Zealand

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
In the unlikely event that there's anyone left in the UK who hasn't been completely desensitized to the perils of IPTV, here's another case to strain the nerves. After being raided five years ago, two brothers from Ilford in Essex have been sentenced to prison. Whether both will actually see the inside of a cell is unclear; one turned up to face the music, the other failed to appear. The reason for his absence is unknown and just the start of a long list of other unanswered questions.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Two IPTV Pirates Sentenced to Prison But After 5 Years Questions Remain

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Popular shadow library LibGen appears to be struggling with technical problems. Regular book downloads stopped working last weekend and remain unavailable. The reason for the issues are unknown but, for now, internal troubles at the site seem more likely than a copyright-related enforcement action.  
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Popular Shadow Library ‘LibGen’ Breaks Down Amidst Legal Troubles

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
File-hosting service Uptobox was taken offline last year following complaints from entertainment industry giants including Amazon, Disney, and StudioCanal. The platform's servers were targeted in a police raid just months after a French court ordered ISPs to block the site. Uptobox tried to reverse this decision, arguing that it's not the piracy haven rightsholders make it out to be, but the court denied that challenge.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Uptobox Bid to Resurrect File-Storage Service Fails in French Court

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Top tier French football leagues, Ligue 1 McDonald's and Ligue 2 BKT, have obtained a new court order to block dozens of pirate IPTV platforms. As presented on the Paris Judicial Court's website, the list of domains amounts to a wall of merged text simply asking to be misinterpreted. Fortunately they're more easily determined in the downloaded order, but that doesn't mean precision blocking won't be needed. Perhaps now more than ever, one mistake could go terribly wrong.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Top French Football Leagues Win Pirate IPTV Blocking Orders

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Ecuador's top football league, LigaPro, continues to fight the availability of pirate streaming services. Dozens of 'unauthorized' platforms are active, but MagisTV is seen as the main adversary. To combat this threat, dozens of new IP-addresses were blocked by Internet providers. Meanwhile, rightsholders caught a ball out of left field, successfully opposing a trademark application by MagisTV.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ‘MagisTV’ Piracy Blocking Efforts in Ecuador Expand, Trademark Application Denied

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
On Russia's answer to YouTube, traffic has doubled in the last 12 months. RuTube is currently awash with pirated copies of Hollywood movies and, during the summer, RuTube used imagery from Barbie and Oppenheimer to advertise the fact. Last week, Russian telecoms operators gave RuTube another boost by massively throttling YouTube. On Friday, RuTube's apps were suddenly removed from Apple's App Store and Google Play.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: RuTube Embraces Piracy Then Vanishes From Apple’s App Store & Google Play

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Warner Music Group says it's building a world-class anti-piracy unit. As part of this quest, the company has a job opening for a new anti-piracy coordinator. Prospects will have to spot the latest piracy trends and find sites and services from where the latest leaks originate. Musical talent is not required, but independent and inquisitive prospects, with a strong attention to detail, are preferred. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Warner Music is Looking for an Anti-Piracy Expert to Monitor Leaks

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
The title of this article contains a question, one that in various forms has been asked millions of times over the years. The reason the same question still gets asked countless times even today, is simple: the answer, should one even exist, is never true for long, even if we assume it was initially true. So what's the harm in asking?
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: What’s the Safest & Most Trusted Site to Download Pirate Streaming Apps?

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC) has repeatedly taken a tough stance on piracy, condemning freeloaders and calling for tough enforcement measures. In a recent earnings call, UFC parent company TKO noted that ESPN price hikes haven't made things easier. On the contrary, the company directly links price increases to the "jacked up" piracy numbers.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: UFC Links Increase in Piracy Numbers to ESPN Price Hikes

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Serie A's bid to force Cloudflare to participate in Piracy Shield, Italy's pirate IPTV blocking system, has failed. The Italian football league filed a legal complaint in April, claiming that Cloudflare assists and protects pirate services. In a decision handed down this week, the Court of Milan said that it has no legal authority to compel Cloudflare to join the program. The Court also denied Serie A's application for an injunction, for reasons that suggest this battle may not be over.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Cloudflare Can’t Be Forced to Use Piracy Shield to Block IPTV, Court Tells Serie A
